Hi,

I feel really stupid but I am struggling, so 
I thought I'd ask anyways. I get to the part where it says to now run the "setup.exe and download the update" but I am really confused because I thought I just extracted from the setup.exe? Basically I cannot "run" that and am really confused as to what I am doing wrong....can you help me please? 

Thanks!

...And yes I have done this before haha....

Okay wow. I apologize. I found the keygen in the Fairlight folder.... this is really embarrassing and I am sorry for the trolling. Also I should apologize for the future in case something else goes wrong and I feel the need to ask an asinine question... thanks though!

Hi. I'd like to ask how to fix a problem extracting this. I keep getting stuck at 90%.

Hey, first off, I want to just thank you for the torrent. :)  I love TS3 and I'm really looking forward to this game and the next episodes.

But I am having a problem with it.  I've run the super short setup.exe and have extracted the Data1, 2, and 3. But every time I try to open the files, it says "Cannot open the cabinet file."

Can you tell me why it's doing this? My firewall has this under the exceptions, I run Kaspersky.

Please respond as soon as you can.
Thank you very much in advance.  :)
